name: Jason Hall

name: Morgan Morgan
text: I place an online order 18 minutes ago and my husband just arrived to pick up my pizza and they tell him he has to wait an additional 15-20 minutes because there are six people in front of me so what I've already ordered witch would make it …More

name: Kamie Dowda
text: My husband called in a delivery order for over $75, and they said it'd take an hour. Okay, no problem. An hour and a half later we call back and.. There was no ticket in his name. We called 3 surrounding locations total, and none had our …More

name: Helen Brell
text: I was very pleased with this Pizza Hut.  I  placed a large order to be delivered the following day,  restaurant staff was very kind and professional, the next day the driver called me with a heads up, was on time and the pizza which was hot and delicious.   Well Done Pizza Hut!

name: Nay De ́ville
text: This pizza hut pizza is sometimes Ok & sometimes horrible. If you order all cheese pizza you got to catch them on the days the manager will be in & your food will be fresh. Otherwise never order cheese pizza. It might look like a pizza that …More

name: T Bates
text: Have you heard this is the best pizza hut I have seen in a great while. The RGM Alicia and the asst. Mgr Mallory run a top notch restaurant. Then my hat goes off to the back of the house staff. Wow they really know there stuff. This a …More

name: Philip Christiansen
text: I think this might be one of the last Pizza Hut buffets in Chattanooga, and it's pretty good. They always have good pizza out, and the wait staff is great on refills.

text: I've ordered from here a few times and they've never gotten my order right. Their honey BBQ wings are just plain wing with a little bit of sauce drizzled on them. …More

text: Although we did get friendly service our waiter was surper distracted my husband had to get up and get himself a refill bc she never showed. The wings and medium pizza were pretty good but the large we ordered had a thick layer of grease on …More

text:

text: Came here to dine in. Me and my husband ordered a lunch special for 2. We ordered at 2:00 at 2: 45 we still did not have any of our food. When asked what was taking so long the manager says we have a hundred pizzas going out.

text: Love me some pizza Hut. 90% of the time, our order is lit! Every now and then, they will skimp on the meat or leave the pizza in too long, but that's hardly ever.

text: Will never order from this one again my pizza did not get deliver for 2 hours and when it finllay got to me it was a grease ball and cold my sause was cover with plastic wrap and bread stick were cold try to call and no one would answer cant reach a manger tried three times so i would rather spend the xtra money for some where else

text: Done an online order to be picked up at 5:30.  Apparently they don't start your order till you get there.  I'm still waiting at 5:46.  This is ridiculous.   Won't be back.

name: brandy Davis
text: They were having a Friday night rush and were having some  issues with one of the ovens   but they were doing the best they could at the time some of the customers were being rude   to the staff   I am very thankful  to have this PIZZAHUT   in the area the staff are very friendly I  received great service  A++

text: Good food, great service.

text: Fresh pizza, no mistakes and complimentary drinks and salad bar.

name: Jim Hill
text: Very disappointed.  Ordered online @ 4:30 pm and still waiting at 5:45pm.  Workers said they are worki g on internet orders.  There is absolutly no reason to promise a time when you cannot meet the orders.

text: Nasty. Breadsticks were hard. We stoped there on our way home which is an hour away. By the time we got home we were all throwing up.

text: Place was clean and the people were nice but wings were over cook til they hard and inedible. Ingredients on pizza are cheap all in all will not go back.

name: John Carroll
text: Just left Pizza hut on rossville boulevard. My wife was pissed she was eating the pasta off the bar and thought she had a crunchy noodle in her mouth and spit it out and it was a artificial finger nail. I thought she was going to hurl. We will never eat at that location again
